amendment.description: Amendment sought to extend the scope of line-item veto authority to include any provision of a proposed revenue bill of which at least 20 percent of the benefit would go to the top 1 percent of income earners.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to extend the scope of line item veto authority to include any provision of a proposed revenue bill of which at least 20 percent of the benefit would go to the top 1 percent of income earners. (Text of the amendment was printed as amendment No. 30 in the Congressional Record of February 1, 1995.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 280 (Roll no. 92).
